profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.11 XMP Package - PDF/A Identification Schema.
profile.description: The PDF/A version and conformance level of a file shall be specified using the PDF/A Identification extension schema.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The PDF/A version and conformance level of a file shall be specified using the PDF/A Identification extension schema.

error.message: The document metadata stream doesn't contains PDF/A Identification Schema.
